snippet.title: Weaving Tides - Alpha Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
~~~»} About Weaving Tides
Weaving Tides is a Zelda-esque adventure where you ride carpet dragons to patch up a world made of magic and textile!
Release: coming to PC/Mac in 2020
Wishlist on Steam: http://bit.ly/WeavingTidesSteam

~~~»} Get the Playgrounds Demo for FREE
Weaving Tides Playgrounds lets you ride on the back of your magical carpet dragon and use his ribbon tail to create beautiful digital embroideries.
Watch the Playgrounds Demo Teaser: https://youtu.be/U5rEyfNoKa0

To receive the demo you just have to:
➡️Join our discord https://discordapp.com/invite/followfeathers
or 
➡️Sign up for our Newsletter http://bit.ly/WeavingTidesNewsletter

~~~»} Follow our game dev journey

Official Website: http://www.weavingtides.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/followfeathers
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FollowFeathers/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/FollowFeathers/
